title: @Riot What happened to the Duck that popped up in the PBE a month ago?
body:
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-G9_TfEu2vyw/VPgTAA0DPAI/AAAAAAAAlNU/p4qopmt53_k/s1600/ddd.jpg

Where did it go?

Is it still coming?

Did it leave Summoners Rift to join ISIS?

How did it taste?

Is it a Boy or a Girl?

Does it say Quack?

Does it have 3 knock ups and a Revive passive?

---


If you are wondering why this is a balance issue, think about this.

Duck champions Winrate = 0%

Not-Duck champions Winrate = 100%

Source [here](https://38.media.tumblr.com/1e70a4bd44ea043d18a29a68e14cbec1/tumblr_mnu98drLS11rdaldwo1_400.gif)

replies.body: Ah he's there, but I believe he has a 10% spawn chance for a game. A rare elusive duck
this is not the waterfowl you're looking for
this is not the waterfowl I am looking for

Oh the memories.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=532j-186xEQ
The correct version too. :thumbsup:
I have seen it paddlin in the river between lower midlane and dragon pit and then it went into the small bush and disappeared.

> [{quoted}](name=Maegges,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7j68cWaB,comment-id=00160002,timestamp=2015-04-11T00:05:30.808+0000)
>
> I have seen it paddlin in the river between lower midlane and dragon pit and then it went into the small bush and disappeared.

sneaky duck ;)
hanging in the bot river to study the adc's. plans to replace sneaky
We should get like a duck icon if we find it
Why is this chance per-person and not per-map-load? I saw him and no-one else could and no-one else believes me!

HAHA! I was in Mumble with a friend and he was staring at the duck. We all thought he was crazy or trolling. He was pinging it, like "There's a duck, right there!"

...one of our friends got killed because it was the start of an URF game and the other team invaded while he was mapped over looking for the "imaginary duck."
Well that's lame...is this a Harvest Moon reference?
I've seen him appear between the small bush near dragon and mid lane's lower bush. He's client-side— my friends couldn't see him. Apparently, he's a rare sight (or people don't notice him).

> [{quoted}](name=Arrevax,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7j68cWaB,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-10T17:45:09.455+0000)
>
> I've seen him appear between the small bush near dragon and mid lane's lower bush. He's client-side— my friends couldn't see him. Apparently, he's a rare sight (or people don't notice him).

he is probably seen more than Garen in high elo tbh.
{{champion:63}} BURN!
My friend swears he saw it in the river on live, by the island bush on the lower side of midlane. Nobody believes him though.

Same here.  I saw it a while ago, but no one else on my team did.  We were all in a Skype call together, and I mentioned it.  They all looked for it, but couldn't see it even though I pinged right on top of it.  They said I was going insane, but I got a screenshot of it before it floated into the bush just north of the Dragon Pit.  All game long I got crap for it.  "Enemy jungler's headed top.  Be careful, I think he's got a duck with him."  "They got Dragon, but it's fine.  We got the Duck.  It gives better stats."  "Guys, Zed just warned me:  The unseen duck is the deadliest."  It was funny, but I must have seemed insane to them.  After the game I showed them the screenshot and they finally believed me.  So far I and only one other person (of our usual group of 6) have seen it.  It's become a sign of good luck for us, since every time it's seen we win by a landslide.

> [{quoted}](name=CC Shepherd,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7j68cWaB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-10T17:42:57.808+0000)
>
> My friend swears he saw it in the river on live, by the island bush on the lower side of midlane. Nobody believes him though.

I saw the duck!!!!

its in the river
bottom side.
North west.
By single area/ward brush. it runs into brush at like 1:30 and then is gone for whole game.
Riot hates ducks :[
yep

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vHjcuBXa0WQ
Didn't you hear, that duck is in charge of the gold which no longer drops off of dragon. He's a bit of a scrooge. Also he has a funny accent.

> [{quoted}](name=Maliginant,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7j68cWaB,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-04-10T21:43:38.061+0000)

I heard he also has 3 annoying nephews who make his life impossible
I thought those were nephews.
thanks, I completely forgot the word :P
Pffft, we all make fowl mistakes from time to time.
some say it has 3 knock ups, a revive passive mixed with a damage steroid, and lastly a 1 second dash
Don't forget his %max health magic damage, that's what makes him balanced.
Smite the duck for permanent baron buff.
for those who have seen it, how big is it? is it minion sized?

> [{quoted}](name=aaronautumn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7j68cWaB,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-04-10T18:41:26.150+0000)
>
> for those who have seen it, how big is it? is it minion sized?

He's super little, like half the size of a minion if I remember right. I've only seen him once :P
could be a female duck

> [{quoted}](name=aaronautumn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7j68cWaB,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-04-10T19:21:28.615+0000)
>
> could be a female duck

Female ducks often don't have any bright colouration (green) like this one. Also I think when it was mentioned officially by Riot they called him a 'guy'.

Before you ask, it's not personally worth my time to find the source but I think if you dug a bit it's either mentioned in patch notes or the red post is on a PBE post on S@20
I like your reasoning and that you refer to where the source would be if someone really cares enough to challenge it. Upvoted!
But is its airspeed faster or slower than an unladen swallows?
African or European?

image of a male and female duck together
http://www.whatbird.com/forum/uploads/gallery/album_4891/med_gallery_34094_4891_1562122.jpg
basically the female is darker in color
males are larger and brighter to attract more attention and added flavor.
so.. looking at the duck ... it appears to be a female.

The duck is, in fact on live. But he doesn't always show up. They teased in the patch notes that he is "pretty noncommittal"

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-55-notes#patch-sr2
I saw him near the bottom-mid lane bush and was like "OMG A DUCK" and freaked out.
There is an Urf the Manatee render as well on the PBE. Idk what happened to it.
haha, every pointless thread possible can u find riot
this

He isn't a champion (too cool to get himself all bloody and all), he is a native of the Rift and swims around in the river (I say hello to him by dancing whenever I see him, he greatly appreciates it). He doesn't come out often (because like all ducks, he is a scholarly chap and prefers to stay in his nest reading books in the den). Also, if you haven't noticed, this particular specimen in question is a male, as denoted by the green plumage on the posterior. Since he is above being a champion, he also does not have a kit, nor does he feel the need to express himself through speech to the lesser beings tromping through his river.

1) SPAAAACE
2) No, it broke up with its GF
3) No
4) Purple
5) I don't know, but I have my best man on the job
6) Only
7) It has two revive passives, also
